backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining task, cooking assignment, recurring chore, and profile types with CRUD operations protected by access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a color‑scheme update with affected frontend files and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten one‑sentence summaries of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint setting up the root div and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication flow and rendering header, tabs, TodayFocus, and routed sections.
frontend/src/components/AddTaskDialog.ts: Dialog component for adding tasks with actor‑readiness checks, voice dictation, validation, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/CalendarDayPlann: Day‑planner view aggregating tasks, cooking assignments, and recurring chores for a selected date with navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/CalendarView.tsx: Main calendar view managing month/week/day modes, loading tasks, assignments, and chores, and rendering planners accordingly.
frontend/src/components/CalendarWeekPlan: Displays a week grid with tasks, cooking assignments, and chores, with navigation and task completion toggling.
frontend/src/components/DinnerRota.tsx: Manages weekly cooking assignments with editing, meal descriptions, fairness stats, and voice dictation support.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: Dialog for editing a task’s name, description, assignee, and due date, including voice dictation integration.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar showing app branding and user menu with logout for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/HeroHeader.tsx: Reusable hero banner with background image, gradient overlay, and optional title/subtitle.
frontend/src/components/LightweightMonth: Renders a monthly calendar grid showing tasks, cooking assignments, and recurring chores with navigation controls. Uses memoized maps for quick daily lookups and allows date selection.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Displays a login page with Internet Identity authentication and branding visuals. Handles login state and error logging.
frontend/src/components/People.tsx: Manages creation, editing, and deletion of people profiles with dialogs and color selection. Loads profiles, allows principal assignment, and restricts edits to the current user.
frontend/src/components/PersonBadge.tsx: Shows a styled badge for a person with optional color indicator and size/variant options.
frontend/src/components/PersonProfileSel: Provides a selector for choosing or manually entering a principal ID, with optional 'Me' autofill and fallback manual mode.
frontend/src/components/RecurringChoresD: Modal for creating, editing, deleting, pausing, and resuming recurring chores with voice dictation support and principal validation.
frontend/src/components/RecurringChoresI: Inline summary section displaying grouped recurring chores with expand/collapse and a shortcut to manage them.
frontend/src/components/TaskList.tsx: Displays, groups, and manages household tasks with add, edit, delete, and completion features using multiple dialogs and hooks.
frontend/src/components/TodayFocus.tsx: Shows tasks due today and today's cooking assignment, with loading states and small task-list rendering.
frontend/src/components/VoiceDictationBu: Provides a voice dictation button with support checks, dynamic tooltips, and a listening indicator.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithReadiness: Wraps useActor to expose readiness, initialization, and error states for safely gating mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, providing login, logout, and stored identity loading through context.
frontend/src/hooks/usePeopleProfilesQuer: Implements profile queries and mutations using the actor, including fetch, upsert, and delete with readiness checks and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations on tasks and related backend interactions with actor readiness checks and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeedSampleData.ts: Empty placeholder hook file for seeding sample data.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionStorageStat: React hook that syncs state with sessionStorage, supporting functional updates and error-safe persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceDictation.ts: Implements a voice dictation hook wrapping the Web Speech API with diagnostics, error handling, and transcript callbacks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, query client, identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/types/webSpeech.d.ts: Type definitions for the Web Speech API, adding SpeechRecognition typings to TypeScript.
frontend/src/utils/actorAvailability.ts: Utilities for checking and guarding backend actor readiness with user-friendly error messages.
Provides helpers to format and stringify actor initialization diagnostics and errors.
frontend/src/utils/candidOption.ts: Utilities for safely encoding optional Candid values, including principals, for backend calls.
frontend/src/utils/cookingAssignmentLabe: Functions to derive display labels and colors for cooking assignments, with profile matching and principal formatting.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentDiagnostics: Structured diagnostic logging utilities for deployment and initialization steps with guidance on failures.
frontend/src/utils/fairness.ts: Computes cooking-assignment fairness stats over date ranges, counting occurrences per person and determining most/least cooked.
frontend/src/utils/personProfiles.ts: Resolves principals to display names and colors, with fallbacks to shortened IDs.
frontend/src/utils/principal.ts: Provides safe principal parsing and validation utilities that return structured results.
frontend/src/utils/recurringChoreDiagnos: Logs structured start and outcome diagnostics for recurring chore mutations with safe error stringification.
frontend/src/utils/recurringChoreMutatio: Normalizes recurring chore errors into user-friendly messages and diagnostic strings.
frontend/src/utils/recurringChoresPrevie: Generates timeline labels, groups recurring chores by weekday, and computes upcoming chores.
frontend/src/utils/recurringChoresSchedu: Determines whether recurring chores appear on specific dates based on timeline rules and filters chores for a date.
frontend/src/utils/taskDayKey.ts: Converts dates and nanosecond timestamps to normalized day keys and retrieves today's key.
frontend/src/utils/taskDueDayGrouping.ts: Groups tasks by due date into sorted day buckets, adding a final group for tasks without due dates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters (including hash routing) and persisting them in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/voiceDictationDiagnos: Diagnostic logger for voice dictation events, errors, and environment context.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, animations, containers, and plugin setup.
frontend/theme-scheme-suggestions.md: Design document outlining three color palette options and selecting Ocean Breeze as the default scheme.
project_state.json: Project state file containing metadata, existing features, and pending feature requests.
